entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
